#include<cstdio>
#include<iostream>
#include<cmath>
using namespace std;
int prime(int n)
{
	int c=0,i;
	while(n%2==0)
	{
		c++;
		n = n/2;
	}
	for(i=3;i<=sqrt(n);i=i+2)
	{
		while(n%i==0)
		{
			c++;
			n = n/i;
		}
	}
	if(n>2)
	{
		c++;
	}
	return c;
}
int main()
{
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		int n;
		cin>>n;
		cout<<prime(n)<<"\n";
	}
	return 0;
}
